Sarge: Ahahaha! Birdbot, you're just who I'm looking for! Papertron, I love=
 you! I'll make sure the Chivtrons notice both of you...

  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Satu=
rday, June 16, 2001 3:30 AM
  Subject: Re: Sarge...


  BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON=






  Papertron: HEH! HEH!



  Birdbot: I've took a guys head off before=
. He wouldn't share so I killed him. I only wanted all 10 boxes of pizza bu=
t he only gave me 9 boxes and a half of another one! He had the nerve to ke=
ep one piece for himself!!!! So I ripped his head off and ate all 10 boxes.=
 And then I woke up all of the neighbors by screaming and singing Barry Man=
olow.



  Papertron: ERF FER FER FER!!! I have 4 identities. Don't tell an=
yone. But right now I'm Papertron. But sometimes I'm Apple Furry Murry, The=
 Smelly Guy and The Silly Goon. ERF FER FER FER!!....
    ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
 Sent: Saturday, June 16, 2001 2:13 AM
    Subject: Re: Sarge...


    Sarg=
e starts laughing.

    Sarge: I'll make sure to get you 2 in, I like your =
styles. So, are you any good at fighting?...

Saturday, June 16, 2001 1:19 AM

      BIRDBOT=
 / PAPERTRON





      Papertron: Well, I'm a stinky chameleon. Erf fer fe=
r fer! Trespassing? I don't know what that is but I've been trying to get t=
hose peoples attention. I want to live there.



      (Birdbot looks at Sa=
rge and stands up straight.)



      Birdbot: RY! All I want is what every=
one else is eating! RY! Nothing is wrong with me accept I hate people when =
they don't leave me alone! And I hate whiney crying people and laughing peo=
ple. I want to join this guys too but they keep ignoring us. Do you know on=
e of their names so I can call them out here?....

ssage -----

y, who are you 2? You wouldn't happen to be trespassing, would you?

      =

        Sarge: What =
are you?

        He looks at Birdbot.

        Sarge: And what's wrong wit=
h you?...
